mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rafinesque, C. S. (Constantine Samuel), 1783-1840
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Visit to Virginia prevented previous call; is sending small parcell of the seeds of the Jeffersonia binata, also a dry capsule of the plant for specimen of the fruit; gives various names of the Jeffersonia binata; asks any contributions for compleat flora of the middle atlantic states he is writing.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1804 July 23, Washington [D.C.] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
